title: Christopher Hitchens Archive v1.0
description:
This is a torrent of the actual torrent. TPB choked on the actual torrent, maybe because the .torrent is over a meg, or that the torrent itself is 92GB/972Files, or maybe I didn't talk nice to it. Dunno. This torrent also contains a file list.



*The main torrent includes these folders:

Articles - (2 Harper's columns and 1 Dawkins interview)

Clips - (Clips from documentaries he was in and other short vids)

C-SPAN - (All his C-SPAN appearances. I got all of them from c-spanvideo.org using rtmpdump so they are in the best quality available. 

Debates - (All the debates I could find)

Discussions an Interviews - (TV interviews and some panel discussions)

Documentaries - (Full documentaries he hosted or was a part of)

News Panels and Talkshows - (Firing Line, Real Time, Charlie Rose, etc. and his appearances on news shows)

Other - (A few transcripts and the Penn and Teller episode he was in)

Radio and Podcasts - (All his radio and podcast appearances I could find, in mp3 if I could find the source or mp4 from youtube)

Solo Talks - ( His solo talks about religion, axis of evil, etc.)

Tributes and Discussions - (Clips from radio and tv of Carol Blue discussing his life and tributes from various shows)

All of the full video/audio files have a description .txt file to go with them which has a description and a date if I could find one. This way it will be easier for people to mirror them on youtube if they want.

*Note: This is a mirror of CaNANDian's torrent on Kickass, all credit goes to them. I'm just spreading this great archive of the Hitch to TPB.
